work.position: Global Operations Data Analyst and Project Manager
work.summary: Oversee all facets of BPO vendor management, allocation and coordination for 18 projects totaling 235 vendor analysts in India, China, Hungary and the US while collaborating globally with management, the risk department, R&D, IT and key vendor contacts in a fast paced and innovative business environment.
highlights: Analyze large data sets to provide key insights and form strategic plans to improve performance
Communicate and collaborate with management at vendor sites to resolve issues and execute plans
Communicate to management the results of analysis, strategic plans and the general state of the projects
Work globally with internal and external vendor managers to enhance their vendor management skills
Review and revise Service Level Agreements, Scopes of Work and Key Performance Indicators
Serve as primary resource for vendor information and issue resolution to keep projects running smoothly
Travel to various vendor sites and Bloomberg offices globally to forge stronger relationships

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
